name: XML Flat File
summary: Learn about .XMLFF files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: The XMLFF format is similar to XML but also supports data that is not encased within a parent child schema. The purpose of the format is to work with database methods in .PY files and to provide users with an open source flat file database solution.

description: Database file format developed by Control Split; contains XML schema merged with Python arrays in plain text format.
